mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students (studentName, sex, englishGrade, mathGrade, societyId, height, birthday, money) VALUES (#{studentName}, #{sex}, #{englishGrade}, #{mathGrade}, #{societyId}, #{height}, #{birthday}, #{money})
mapper.update: update students set studentName=#{studentName}, sex=#{sex}, englishGrade=#{englishGrade}, mathGrade=#{mathGrade}, societyId=#{societyId}, height=#{height}, birthday=#{birthday}, money=#{money} where id = #{id};
